CustomField.description: Check box if contract states covered repairs will be charged bonus time only on overtime. For example, if it is 1.7x OT customer will be charged .7x only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check box if contract states covered repairs will be charged bonus time only on overtime. For example, if it is 1.7x OT customer will be charged .7x only.
CustomField.label: Bonus Time Only
